name: The TakeOver
summary: The Takeover is a side-scrolling beat'em up inspired by 90's classics such as Streets of Rage and Final Fight. Battle solo or alongside a friend in local co-op while listening to awesome tunes from Little V Mills, Richie Branson, James Ronald and industry legend Yuzo Koshiro!
info:
• 别名: 接管
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Beat 'em up
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2019-11-10
  • 开发: Pelikan13
  • 发行: Pelikan13
